gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 105, Nets 103
gameRecap.excerpt: Anfernee Simons took Mikal Bridges to the rim and made a game-winning field goal with 0.2 seconds left as the Blazers defeated the Nets, 105-103. Jerami Grant (30 total points, eight rebounds) and Anfernee Simons (20 total points, four rebounds, four assists) scored 27 of their 50 total points in the 4th quarter as Portland outscored the Nets 31-20, in the final frame overall. Mikal Bridges (21 points) and Spencer Dinwiddie (19 points, seven assists) led the Nets as Nic Claxton added 12 points and 12 rebounds. The Blazers improve to 11-29 as the Nets move to 16-24.
